content:
Hey @Cindy Jiang , @Ken Rubin , @Jenni Syed , @Emma Jones , @Bas van den Heuvel , @Ricardo Quintano , @Isaac Vetter , @Eric Haas (but especially Bas and Ricardo).

Thank you for your review of the FHIRcast STU2 ballot content! I'm placing the following issues into a block vote. Please respond before March 17th to have specific issues withdrawn.

You can see all of balloted FHIRcast isses in jira. (project = FHIR AND Specification = "FHIRCast (FHIR) [FHIR-fhircast]" And reporter = currentuser())

- FHIR-25895 - Cindy Jiang  - Persuasive

Thank you!
